Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for tone map corrections.

brightnessR.Wiki: Multiplier to red component of the RGB color that corrects the brightness.

brightnessG.Wiki: Multiplier to green component of the RGB color that corrects the brightness.

brightnessB.Wiki: Multiplier to blue component of the RGB color that corrects the brightness.

contrastR.Wiki: Multiplier to red component of the RGB color that corrects the contrast.

contrastG.Wiki: Multiplier to green component of the RGB color that corrects the contrast.

contrastB.Wiki: Multiplier to blue component of the RGB color that corrects the contrast.

saturation.Wiki: Multiplier to the value that corrects the saturation

hue.Wiki: Multiplier to the value that corrects the hue

sfxMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the amount of particles used.
